channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The unique bonus categories built for businesses (and the cards that offer them)
item.description: Business rewards cards often earn elevated rates on business-specific spending categories. Here are the most interesting ones.

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred Card review: A top travel and dining card
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred Card is one of the most popular travel rewards credit cards. We'll help you decide whether it's worth applying for.

item.title: JetBlue cuts JFK-Amsterdam route, likely done with European growth 'for a while'
item.description: JetBlue won't bring back service from New York JFK to Amsterdam in 2026, but continues to serve the Netherlands from Boston.

item.title: What is the difference between Virgin Atlantic Flying Club and Virgin Red?
item.description: We break down the differences between the Virgin Atlantic Flying Club and Virgin Red programs. Plus, learn how to link your accounts to take advantage...

item.title: British Airways Club devaluation: Flights cost up to 14% more Avios
item.description: The British Airways Club program has increased the cost of all award tickets by up to 14%. Here's what you need to know.
